text: @NYGovCuomo I love watching your updates. They are honest, reassuring, and truthful. I pray for your state, the healthcare workers, and your leadership. Please be safe! #TexasStrong #TexansforCuomo #COVID19 #HealthcareHeroes #NewYorkStrong
